caption: Ordered the fresh sashimi grade ahi sandwich and truffle fries to share. . And a macadamia nut cookie for dessert.  The place was empty but lots of people did online carryout. We asked if we could eat inside and the female was very accommodating. She brought down 2 chairs and cleaned a table for us.  The ahi sandwich was awesome. The bun was nice and soft. The ahi was seared with the inside raw. It was loaded high with alfalfa sprouts and watercress and a lightly seasoned aioli sauce. It comes with what appears to be freshly made crinkle cut potato chips.  The truffle fries were warm and crisp. They are shoestring cut with parmesan cheese and truffle oil. It comes in a paper bowl with emig fries for 2 people.  The macadamia nut cookie was well flavored and crispy.  We didn't ask, but what would be good is if you could exchange the chips for the truffle fries for a nominal fee.  The staff were very friendly. All in all I really enjoyed this place. Definitely coming back.

HICraft Kitchen is the real deal! I’ve had a number of items from their menu and it’s all amazing. My favorite is the Philly Cheesesteak- The bread is AMAZING. And the soups are always on point. Everything is made here with expert quality and the service is always so good. Mahalo for being here!
Literally everything on the menu is amazing. Between my partner and I, we really have tried it all. LOVE hicraft!
The people that work here are worth a full rating. I had a vegetarian mushroom flatbread and it was excellent.
Best burger I've had in a LONG time. Loved the ambiance and the menu is great. Curious to try more dishes.

(Translated by Google) So happy to have discovered this luncheonette in Honolulu during my vacation. The place is beautiful, the cozy atmosphere with jazz music that accompanies the delicious food. I chose the spectacular Saturday lunch tuna ahi burger. So Fresh, So Good! Portuguese soup a delight. The beetroot salad with fresh goat cheese a delight. The homemade pickles are wonderful. Everything is fresh and carefully prepared by the chef and the very friendly team. The welcome is really warm. We feel good at Hicraft and I already want to come back! For a gourmet like me I could not have asked for better.  (Original) Si heureuse d’avoir découvert cette luncheonette in Honolulu lors de mes vacances. Le lieu est magnifique, l’atmosphère cosy avec une musique jazz qui vient accompagner la délicieuse nourriture. J’ai choisi le lunch spécial du samedi tuna ahi burger, spectaculaire. Si Frais, si bon! La soupe portugaise un délice. La salade de betterave rouge avec fromage frais de chèvre un ravissement. Les pickles fait maison sont merveilleux. Tout est frais et préparé avec soin par le chef et l’équipe très sympathique. L’accueil est vraiment chaleureuse. On se sent bien à Hicraft et j’ai déjà envie de revenir! Pour une gourmande comme moi je ne pouvais rêver mieux.

I have been by this place many times and am glad I finally stopped in! They have sandwiches, soups, and salads to appease all taste buds. We tried the Italian Job and The Che (my favorite so far!) along with a side of their yummy Yuzu Pickles. This place really lives up to their name as all their food is truly a craft and everything is made to order. Don't forget to ask about their daily specials too! I do feel that the prices are a little high but you get the quality, ambiance, and friendly service that all comes along with it so that makes it all worth it. I will be back to try all the different sandwiches on their menu!!
Hidden craft sandwhich shop behind Down to Earth market. Well worth the find and to stop in for some lunch

Savory and hearty sandwiches all at an affordable price. Modern, relaxed atmosphere- loved the glass partition from seating area to the kitchen. The deli meat is freshly cut, as well as the assortment of cheeses they so thoughtfully prepare with tapenade and crispy greens. Bummed they don’t have a location in CA! Location is a little difficult to find, but so worth the hunt. Unbelievable craving for a sandwich? Go. Here. :)
OMG !! Great attendance and great food Love the sandwich !! I recommend
Excellent sandwiches and friendly staff! Definitely recommend trying them all! However, they don’t accept ApplePay... which seems a step backwards in comparison to all other new shops.
